alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:13AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry and southwestern Bibb Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 713 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mertz, or 14 miles west of Brent, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brent, Centreville, Talladega National Forest, Eoline, Low Gap, West Centreville, Mertz, Trio and Bibb County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
